placeholder: Input your ETH wallet address (PTT wallet address of BigONE is preferred)
contentText: Share the following link. Invite friends to receive additional 188 PTT awards. (Please enter the group and complete authentication. The invite link will take effect and your invitation will be recorded after successful authentication.)
enterSuccess: 2.Click the button ”join” to join telegram group. Please send verification code into the group. You will get PTT at once!
